page.title: 04Wildlife.
page.content: In the Thornhill area the wildlife consists of deer,birds,rabbits,hares, badgers,squirrels,frogs,toads,voles and shrews. Deer are one of the fastest animals around here and are one of the strongest,they can jump very high. There are lots of birds around here like sparrows,robins,bluetits etc. Birds of Prey around here mostly live in the hills but the owls will stay in the woods and hunt. You can get lots of owls like Barn Owls, Snowy Owls,Tawny Owls and Long-eared Owls. Kestrels mostly live up high on hills and you don't see many on low ground. Buzzards are big birds and are very sharp eyed which is how they find their prey. Badgers are the rarest around here. They are very shy and nocturnal.
